text: Kingsoft Online Privacy Policy
Release date of this version: November 24, 2020
Effective date: November 24, 2020
This "Privacy Policy" is applicable to the Jinshan Pass registration service (hereinafter referred to as "this service") for all Kingsoft Software operations.

You are welcome to use this service. This "Privacy Policy" will work hard to explain the policies and measures of this service in collecting, using, managing, and protecting your personal information through the easy -to -understand, concise and concise text, as well as us as our personal information.The way you provide access, update, delete and protect these information.

Please note that this "Privacy Policy" is only applicable when you register the Jinshan Pass. If you log in to online games, mobile games and mobile software operated by Jinshan Software through Jinshan Pass, you need to agree to the privacy policy of the corresponding game and software.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: This "Privacy Policy" is only applicable when registering the Jinshan Pass. For example, if you log in to online games, mobile games and mobile software operated by Jinshan Software through the Jinshan Pass, you need to agree to the corresponding privacy policy.

text: This service operator "Chengdu Xishanju Shiyou Technology Co., Ltd." and its related companies (hereinafter referred to as "we") will protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant provisions of laws and regulations.

In order to ensure that you can better use the services we provide, we recommend that you carefully read this "Privacy Policy" (especially the bold clauses that are directly related to your rights and involve your personal sensitive information), and then decide after confirming the full understanding.Whether we use the service we provide to you, if you have any questions, please contact us to get in contact with us through the contact information provided by this policy.

1. Collection of personal information

You can manage and delete Cookie by allocating browsers (most of the network browsers will automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify the browser settings according to your needs to reject, cookie).

text: 4.4 Safety suggestion

Although the above -mentioned reasonable and effective measures have been taken and the standards required by relevant laws have been adopted, they are limited by existing technical restrictions. This service still cannot guarantee that your personal information canSafety during communication.

Therefore, it is recommended that you take positive measures to ensure the security of personal information, such as setting complex passwords, modifying the account password regularly, and not disclosing personal information such as your account password to others.
You should try to avoid providing personal sensitive information when submitting personal information to this website and decide carefully.

If you find your personal information disclosure, especially your account password leak, please contact us immediately according to the contact information provided in this privacy policy so that we can take corresponding measures.
